name: Lovely Runner
description: A heartwarming story about a marathon runner and a sports journalist finding love amidst life's challenges and hurdles.

name: When the Phone Rings
description: A suspenseful thriller where a phone call connects a mysterious woman with a dangerous past.

name: The King: Eternal Monarch
description: A fantasy romance that worlds as a king seeks to protect his realm and the woman he loves.

name: Mr. Plankton
description: A quirky comedy-drama about an aimless young man who discovers unexpected connections while drifting through life.

name: Queen of Tears
description: A captivating drama about a powerful woman navigating betrayal love in a cutthroat corporate parallel world & secret politics.

name: Bussiness Proposal
description: A most romantic and comedy drama, woman navigating in a cutthroat corporate world.
